page.title: 17Events-W.Pilton,Edinburgh
page.content: The most notable event in our area has been the changes made in our housing. For many years the local houses were all rented and for various reasons they were allowed to fall into disrepair. The{West Pilton}area got a bad reputation for dampness, vandalism, break-ins and untidiness. The local council has sold off a lot of houses (see "Housing in West Pilton") to private developers. Many of our school friends have had to move away from the area. Many of our houses are now being renovated and the scheme is looking much nicer. In{West {Granton}the ramps are being removed and steps are being built. Entry phones will cut down vandalism. Some families have moved into the new houses so we have new children in {Craigmuir Primary School.}There have been many changes to our local area.
